changeSet.author: Jared Patton
changeSet.createView: SELECT ads.id as ad_id, (count(leads.id)/SUM(ad_stats.daily_views))*100 AS ctr_percentage FROM ads LEFT JOIN ad_stats ON ad_stats.id = ads.id LEFT JOIN leads ON leads.ad_id = ad_stats.id GROUP BY ads.id

changeSet.author: Jared Patton
Jared Patton
changeSet.createView: SELECT ads.id as ad_id, (SUM(ad_stats.daily_views)/COUNT(leads.id))*100 AS conversion_rate_percentage FROM ads LEFT JOIN ad_stats ON ad_stats.id = ads.id LEFT JOIN leads ON leads.ad_id = ad_stats.id INNER JOIN orders ON orders.lead_id = leads.id GROUP BY ads.id

changeSet.author: Jared Patton
changeSet.createView: SELECT leads.ad_id, state, count(leads.id) as leads_in_state FROM leads INNER JOIN orders ON orders.lead_id=leads.id GROUP BY leads.ad_id, leads.state;

changeSet.author: Jared Patton
changeSet.createView: SELECT ads.id, AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,leads.date_of_birth,CURDATE())) as average_age FROM ads LEFT JOIN ad_stats ON ad_stats.id = ads.id LEFT JOIN leads ON leads.ad_id = ad_stats.id GROUP BY ads.id

changeSet.author: Jared Patton
changeSet.createView: SELECT ads.id, SUM((orders.unit_price * orders.quantity) + orders.shipping) AS total_revenue FROM ads LEFT JOIN ad_stats ON ad_stats.id = ads.id LEFT JOIN leads ON leads.ad_id = ad_stats.id LEFT JOIN orders ON orders.lead_id = leads.id GROUP BY ads.ID
